com.paymill.services

Class PreauthorizationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paymill.services.PreauthorizationService

  • public class PreauthorizationService
extends Object
    The PreauthorizationService is used to list, create and delete PAYMILL Preauthorizations.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Vassil Nikolov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected HttpClient httpClient

      Preauthorization createWithPayment(Payment payment, Integer amount, String currency)

      Works only for credit cards.

        protected HttpClient httpClient

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public PaymillList<Preauthorization> list()
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Preauthorization objects.
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Preauthorizations and their total count.

      • list

        public PaymillList<Preauthorization> list(Integer count,
                                 Integer offset)
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Preauthorization objects, overriding the default count and offset.
        Parameters:
        count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
        offset - Integer to start from.
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Preauthorizations and their total count.

      • list

        public PaymillList<Preauthorization> list(Preauthorization.Filter filter,
                                 Preauthorization.Order order)
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Preauthorization objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.
        Parameters:
        filter - Preauthorization.Filter or null
        order - Preauthorization.Order or null
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Preauthorizations and their total count.

      • list

        public PaymillList<Preauthorization> list(Preauthorization.Filter filter,
                                 Preauthorization.Order order,
                                 Integer count,
                                 Integer offset)
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Preauthorization objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.
        Parameters:
        filter - Preauthorization.Filter or null
        order - Preauthorization.Order or null
        count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
        offset - Integer to start from.
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Preauthorizations and their total count.

      • get

        public Preauthorization get(Preauthorization preauthorization)
        Returns and refresh data of a specific Preauthorization.
        Parameters:
        preauthorization - A Preauthorization with Id.
        Returns:
        Refreshed instance of the given Preauthorization.

      • get

        public Preauthorization get(String preauthorizationId)
        Returns and refresh data of a specific Preauthorization.
        Parameters:
        preauthorizationId - Id of the Preauthorization.
        Returns:
        Preauthorization object, which represents a PAYMILL preauthorization.

      • createWithToken

        public Preauthorization createWithToken(String token,
                               Integer amount,
                               String currency)
        Creates Use either a token or an existing payment to Authorizes the given amount with the given token.
        Parameters:
        token - The identifier of a token.
        amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        Returns:
        Transaction object with the Preauthorization as sub object.

      • createWithToken

        public Preauthorization createWithToken(String token,
                               Integer amount,
                               String currency,
                               String description)
        Creates Use either a token or an existing payment to Authorizes the given amount with the given token.
        Parameters:
        token - The identifier of a token.
        amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        description - A short description for the preauthorization.
        Returns:
        Transaction object with the Preauthorization as sub object.

      • createWithPayment

        public Preauthorization createWithPayment(Payment payment,
                                 Integer amount,
                                 String currency)
        Authorizes the given amount with the given Payment.
        Works only for credit cards. Direct debit not supported.
        Parameters:
        payment - The Payment itself (only creditcard-object)
        amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        Returns:
        Transaction object with the Preauthorization as sub object.

      • createWithPayment

        public Preauthorization createWithPayment(Payment payment,
                                 Integer amount,
                                 String currency,
                                 String description)
        Authorizes the given amount with the given Payment.
        Works only for credit cards. Direct debit not supported.
        Parameters:
        payment - The Payment itself (only creditcard-object)
        amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        description - A short description for the preauthorization.
        Returns:
        Transaction object with the Preauthorization as sub object.

      • delete

        public void delete(Preauthorization preauthorization)
        This function deletes a preauthorization.
        Parameters:
        preauthorization - The Preauthorization object to be deleted.

      • delete

        public void delete(String preauthorizationId)
        This function deletes a preauthorization.
        Parameters:
        preauthorizationId - The Id of the Preauthorization.

      • delete

        public void delete(Transaction transaction)
        This function deletes a preauthorization.
        Parameters:
        transaction - A Transaction which should have a Preauthorization as a sub object.
